DOC.brief_summary: The study investigates , among woman regular cycle ( 25 45 day ) , endometrium well prepared transfer embryo cryopreserved subsequent embryo implantation rate high cycle start daily , small-dose hormonal injection cycle without daily injection .
DOC.brief_title: What Best Preparation Embryo Transfer Cryo Cycles : Natural Cycle Light Hormonal Stimulation ?
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent . Women regular cycle ( 21 35 day ) . Embryos 50 % intact blastomeres thaw . Embryo endometrium synchronize . Embryo storage time longer 5 year .
